data.name: Lemon boy roblox theme
BNHA Deku roblox theme
Zero Two Roblox Theme
Connect Box Router (UPC / Ziggo / etc)
data.description:
Theme for the ConnextBox Cable Modem Router as provided by UPC / Ziggo (among others).

• Replaces the plain-text login-textfield with a password-textfield like one (i.e. non-visible passwords !)
• Enables the Hidden 'Check Router Status' link at the Login screen
• Some subtle styling of links, removing the default text-underline unless hovering

Note: If you don't use the router's default IP address of 192.168.178.1 you should replace this in the CSS-code to the correct IP address for your setup.

data.name: RlsLog.net Dark 2020
data.description:
Light-weight dark theme for the rlslog.net website, including ad-suppression.
Using a dedicated ad-blocker for this site is still strongly recommendable as it's known to include malicous/deceiving/mining ads.

Artemis Dark Mode
data.description: A simple Dark Mode for the Artemis TUM platform. Reduces eyestrain for our excellent TUM students who are working late.
